name: Horde: Zombie Outbreak
description: Ever wanted to control a bloodthirsty horde of zombies and wreak havoc on cities around the world? Well now you can! In Horde: Zombie Outbreak the player assumes the role of the zombies and must overthrow the world by infecting the humans! Each person you infect will join you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32Bit Processor: Dual Core 3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvdia GT 560, AMD Radeon 6870 Storage: 750 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommend
